item.description: The Bungalow is a well hidden secret...this bar is like home away from home. It has the feel of an outdoor tiki bar right in your living room. It is quaint and cozy with a nice size bar, comfortable lounging chairs, large t.v. screen, indoor fireplace, outdoor fire pit and patio furniture. The hospitality and ambiance is perfect for intimate gatherings, and best of all they serve drinks that are great and affordable. I am so there...
item.how_to_find_us: The Bungalow is not visible from the street, enter the Waterfront, walk towards the outdoor patio, down stairs, take a left, and it will be on your left just a little way up
item.name: The Bungalow
